entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of snow mixed with rain beginning in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
